sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>When making a combat check that does not involve either using the Gunnery skill or operating a non-starship weapon. The character may add force dice no greater than his force rating to the check. The character may spend force points to add advantage, or 3 force points to add 1 triumph (character's choice), to the result. Advantage gained in this way cannot be used to recover strain.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Essential Kill</name> <number>TAL0001317</number> <passive_or_active>passive</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>ben.fisher</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-04-19 04:42:30</sys_created_on> <sys_id>c89f454c2f030d10e0f497eef699b6d0</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>ben.fisher</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-04-19 04:42:30</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
